review: Dr. Aman Sodhi was very friendly. She understood the issue well. I had infection in my gum. She didn't directly opt for any expensive surgery or injection. Rather, gave medicines in order to treat on it's own. I went here the first time, and liked the treatment and staff behaviour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
‚ÄúMy profession does not excuse me‚Äù- this sentence by Dr. Aman Sodhi during our interaction is a gist to explain her dedication towards profession. However, elaborating my experience during and after the dental treatment explains the service blueprint of the treatment process. I had one of my tooth filling in quadrant-3 molar tooth fallen/ chipped of during COVID-19 lockdown, had no other option but to postpone the treatment. Over a period of time, the tooth had infected beyond regular filling and it needed ‚ÄúRoot Canal Treatment‚Äù (at this point I was so paranoid, that I gave a thought of not getting the treatment). With no option left; agreed for a ‚ÄúRoot Canal Treatment‚Äù half heartedly. I have seen both my parents getting RCT and both of them had bad experiences and lot of pain during the procedure. Dr. Aman ensured, RCT will not pain and assured she would take care and nothing to worry. I was very paranoid as the  RCT procedure was about to begin, Kudos to the patience of Dr. Aman (haven‚Äôt seen a doctor as patient as she is); she was very cautious and patient throughout the process. She explained me about the process during treatment and also prepared me (this made me aware of what is about to come).  Dr. Aman used to crack jokes and put me into a conversation to divert my attention during the treatment so that I don‚Äôt think of pain and be aware of the process. In the end RCT, went well; however it was not the easy one for Dr. Aman - there were 4 canines in the tooth and it took longer for her to finish; may be she would have finished it in 2 visits, but to my paranoid attitude she took 4 clinic visits to finish the process. Dr. Aman is hands on in judging the situation and understanding the problem - also she resolves the problem with best solution. 

Now, I blindly trust Dr. Aman and follow her instructions when it about my dental health, though I got couple of my dental fillings redone after RCT treatment, the first experience is always a laying stone for future. Now I recommend all my loved ones to go to Dr. Aman for dental treatment.
The entire team of Dental Solutions clinic are dedicated and true to service.
Very friendly doc! Explains everything clearly. X-ray facility also available in her clinic.  She examined the X-ray and suggested the line of treatment clearly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ******* ** **** * **** **** not only Dr Aman, in fact her associates are equally good. The patience and calmness she displays while listening to your issues and the easiness at which she treats you is something that is worth appreciating. I randomly came across this place for my treatment, now my entire family goes to Dr Aman for our Dental issues. She is probably the only Doctor in Bangalore who is least bothered about money and extremely possessive about her patients.... I ...rather everyone from my family Highly Recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dental Solutions clinic for a routine dental check-up, and I must say, it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. From the moment I stepped into the clinic, I was greeted warmly by the friendly Dr. Shravya Shetty, creating a welcoming atmosphere.The clinic itself was neat, with a clean and modern interior that immediately put me at ease. The waiting area was comfortable and well-maintained, providing a relaxing environment before my appointment. My dentist, Dr. Aman Sodhi, was highly professional and knowledgeable. She took the time to thoroughly explain each step of the procedure, ensuring I was well-informed and comfortable. Her expertise and gentle approach helped alleviate any anxiety I had, making the entire experience pleasant and stress-free.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,

The denture is so nicely set and my mother in law is able to eat almost everything at the age of 73.

review: **** ****** **** *******  Went there for my RCT consultation.. She listens my problem patiently and explains every single stages of the treatment.. I was very terrified at the very beginning because of the acute pain i had, and with the Whole RCT process... but she consoled me like a family member... As recommended by my friend, I just went there for the consultation, no plan to take treatment as such... but the way she handled me and my problem- I was like what else can I ask for... I straight away decided to go for the treatment.. and OMG it went really well with no pain..I would Highly recommend Dr Aman Sodhi for any dental issues... It's not only the treatment, also the level of comfort u would have with her , it's hard to get with anyone else.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i had booked an appointment for dental tartar. waiting time was less then 15mins, and that too because of the fumigation done to prevent corona infections. At one glance she explained why i was having frequent bleeding teeth and asked me to go for scaling and polishing because of the tartar forming. though the price was a little high but it was worth it. its just been second day and my teeth look new and not a single incident of bleeding. Rest all safety measures taken by the staff. well i know where to go for any dental issues. Dr. Aman Sodhiüëçüèº

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have been delaying my visit to a dentist since 7 years now. it was the first time I had an excruciating pain in my tooth and even in this time, I just couldn't stay home . I was lucky to have Practo suggest me Dr Aman who was more than a savior to me. I was so much in pain and dreaded the injection so much, she showed all her patience and treated my tooth. I went for a second seating without any fear and for the injection done . she makes you feel so comfortable, just like one of her kids and you won't even realise when it's done. can't thank her enough for easing my pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Re-Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I went to the doctor because a recently treated root canal by another doctor was paining again. She took a detailed medical history - which was surprising in a good way. She got a full picture and explained to me what was causing my limited mouth opening and what were the problems with the root canal treated tooth and other problems too. The procedure was complex because of the various problems I had and she was kind, generous and patient with her time and expertise. She‚Äôs very professional and takes the time to explain things and also offer options regarding treatment in a way that a lay person can understand without dumbing things down or complicating them. 

It took around 6 sittings to get my root canal done and each sitting about an hour because of my limited mouth opening. She was patient, and she put me at ease while making sure that I was comfortable during the procedure. This is the most enjoyable dental procedure I‚Äôve done despite it being very complex. Her fees are so very reasonable and I was very pleased that every charge was explained to me and at every point there was full transparency. 

I see her and her team work with so much professionalism, passion and genuine care for their patients. That is so very rare in these days and Dr. Aman is officially one of my favourite doctors now. 

I recommend her whole heartedly for her expertise, knowledge, care and attitude as a human being and a doctor.

Dr Aman is an amazing doctor. She has treated me and several of my family members of various dental issues. She is exceptional in easing and calming patients under treatment and explains issues and treatment patiently. Even her staff are very polite and friendly. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,

Thanks to Dr. Aman and her whole team..

Got proper stain removal in a single sitting. 4 stars because I had actually visited for a swollen gum and the recommendation was that I get a cleaning done before any other diagnosis. The cleaning was done well, except that the bib was put in place after all of my saliva was in my hair. This needs to be step one. Nonetheless, the cleaning was well done. I just kept feeling that the swelling wasn't given as much attention as should have been because it lasted a while after the cleaning. It's still here but getting better tad bit slowly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Came here for second opinion after horrific advice from a well reputed ‚Äúchildren‚Äù hospital‚Äôs dental doc, suggesting surgery (with anaesthesia) to two year old kid. Finally got sensible advice from dr Aman. folks please avoid visiting branded hosp for dental advice at least, coz they will have some junior doctors as they cant afford experience (simple corp math). these big branded corporate hospitals can easily force these junior docs by making them nervous about their job security and by other corp arm twisting stuffs to manipulate and keep their infrastructure investment, doc/staff charges in mind before advising a visitor. You should definitely spend Rs. 300 to check the worthiness of my words before you believe me, visit Dr Aman to check out for any dental problems then take the final call. Thanks üôèü§ó
